title: UK PDC Metadata Record Generator - ISO 19115 v1 configuration schema
description: Metadata record configuration schema for the ISO 19115 metadata standard (version 2)

abstract.title: Abstract
examples: This abstract, and the record to which it belongs, is fictitious.

address.title: Physical address
address.description: Address for a physical location/building, for sending post/mail or visiting in-person.

delivery_point.title: Delivery point
delivery_point.description: Name and street address to location/building.
examples: British Antarctic Survey, High Cross, Madingley Road

administrative_area.title: Administrative area
administrative_area.description: County, state or other region containing location/building.

postal_code.title: Postal code
postal_code.description: Post code, zip code or other reference for location/building.

aggregations.title: Aggregations
aggregations.description: Foreign resources related to this resource.

aggregation.title: Aggregation
aggregation.description: A foreign resource related to this resource.

association_type.title: Association Type
association_type.description: Describes the type or kind of relation between this resource and the foreign resource.

initiative_type.title: Initiative Type
initiative_type.description: Provides additional context about the type of relation between this resource and the foreign resource.

constraint.title: Constraint
constraint.description: Abstract access/usage/security constraint for describing limitations on accessing the resource.

restriction_code.title: Restriction code
restriction_code.description: The domain/cause of the limitation. Currently this is only used for INSPIRE limitations on public access.

inspire_limitations_on_public_access.title: INSPIRE limitations on public access
inspire_limitations_on_public_access.description: Information about limitations to public access within the context of the EU INSPIRE regulations.

statement.title: Access statement
statement.description: Explanation/description of the limitation. Not currently used.

copyright_licence.title: Copyright licence
copyright_licence.description: Information on which copyright licence the resource is licenced under.

code.title: Code
code.description: Internal code for popular/supported copyright licences, limited subset of the SPDX licence list.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL to the licence the resource is licenced under. Typically this displays a licence summary.

statement.title: Statement
statement.description: Summary statement, notice and/or attribution for the licence the resource is licenced under. Typically this states which licence is used and where users can find more information about it.
examples: This information is licensed under the Create Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence (CC BY 4.0). To view this licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

required_citation.title: Required citation
required_citation.description: Information on a citation users must include if using the resource. Requires either a free-text citation, or a DOI from which a citation will be automatically generated.

statement.title: Statement
statement.description: Details of the required citation and instructions on how users should include the citation.
examples: Cite this information as: 'Watson, C. *Antarctic Coastline (Polygon) - (MAGIC ADD candidate metadata record).* Mapping and Geographic Information Centre, British Antarctic Survey. https://doi.org/10.5285/86BD7A1A-845D-48A9-8D71-59FDF7290556'

doi.title: DOI
doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the resource, or that should be cited for the resource.

constraints.title: Constraints
constraints.description: Access/usage constraints for describing limitations on accessing or using the resource.

items.title: Constraint
items.description: Access/usage constraint describing a limitation on accessing or using the resource

type.title: Constraint type
type.description: Whether the constraint constrains how the resource can be accessed, or be used.

restriction_code.title: Restriction code
restriction_code.description: The domain the constraint pertains to.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL identifying, or relating to, the constraint.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: An individual or organisation related to the resource, or related to an element related to the resource.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Telephone number, including international dialing code.

role.title: Role
role.description: Role describing how the contact relates to the resource, or how the contact relates to an element related to the resource.

contact_identity.title: Contact identity
contact_identity.description: Name, and optionally identifier, for an individual or organisation.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of an individual or organisation. Individuals should use the form '[family name], [given name(s)]'. Organisations can include departments and divisions as a prefix to provide clarity.
examples: Mapping and Geographic Information Centre, British Antarctic Survey

href.title: URL
href.description: URL identifying, or relating to, the individual or organisation. Identifiers are restricted to ORCID iDs (for individuals) and Research Organisation Registry (ROR) or International Standard Name Identifier (ISNI) identifiers (for organisations).

title.title: URL Tile (code)
title.description: Title for the URL, may only be used to indicate the type of identifier used in the URL.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Individuals or organisations related to the resource or the description of the resource.

credit.title: Credit
credit.description: Recognition of those who contributed to the resource.
examples: Supported by the Wellcome Trust, grant no. 1234

date.title: Date
date.description: A literal date or date time, including time zone which should be UTC.

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: A series of dates describing aspects of the resource (creation, update), or dates describing aspects of an element related to the resource.

date_precision.title: Date precision
date_precision.description: An internal, optional, property stating whether a date is specific to a year or month. This is needed where dates are required as YYYY-MM-DD values but are only accurate to YYYY-MM or YYYY. Typically users use the first day/month for unknown values, meaning a date '2010-01-01' could mean '2020-01-01', '2020-01-??' or '2020-??-??'. This is typically needed for resources who's lineage is now unknown and ambiguity is required.

date_stamp.title: The date when the record describing the resource was last updated.

distributor.title: Distributor
distributor.description: A contact limited to the role of distributor.

distribution_option.title: Distribution Option
distribution_option.description: Combination of a format and transfer option defining one form the resource is distributed in.

distribution_options.title: Distribution Options
distribution_options.description: Set of formats and transfer options defining the forms the resource is distributed in.

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: Version or edition of the resource, or element related to the resource.

extent.title: Extent
extent.description: The spatial (2D or 3D) and temporal span of the resource, in terms of area/volume and time covered.

file_identifier.title: File identifier
file_identifier.description: Identifier for the record describing the resource. This is almost always a UUID (v4).

format.title: Format
format.description: Data format the resource is available in.

graphic_overviews.title: Graphic overview
graphic_overviews.description: One or more images that summarise the resource visually.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique name or reference to differentiate each graphic overview.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL to the graphic overview file.

description.title: Description
description.description: Free text description of the graphic overview, typically used for alternative text.

mime_type.title: MIME type
mime_type.description: File format or media type for the graphic overview.

geographic_extent.title: Geographic extent
geographic_extent.description: A description of the area the resource covers.

bounding_box.title: Bounding box
bounding_box.description: A set of coordinates for a rectangle that encloses the resource.

allOf.title: Geographic Identifier
allOf.description: A geographic identifier relating to the area or location of the resource.

hierarchy_level.title: Hierarchy level
hierarchy_level.description: The kind and scope of information the resource consists of and describes.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier assigned to the resource, or element related to the resource, by an external entity (e.g. a DOI, a grant reference).

identifier.title: Identifier (value)
identifier.description: Identifier value, this may be a URL.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL identifying, or relating to, the identifier. Identifiers are restricted to DOIs and grant references iDs (for resources related to grant funded projects) (for organisations).

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: The code or identifier for the domain or scheme this identifier is registered within.

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.description: A series of identifiers assigned to the resource by an external entity.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Sets of keywords describing characteristics or aspects of the resource, or that relate the resource to or within other resources. Different keyword sets should be used for different sources and types (e.g. theme, location, sensor).

terms.title: Terms
terms.description: List of terms within the keyword set that describe the resource or its relation to, or within, other resources.

items.title: Term
items.description: Term within the keyword set that describes the resource or its relation to, or within, other resources.

term.title: Term (value)
term.description: A keyword term, as a single value or a path of values.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL identifying, or relating to, the term.

type.title: Type
type.description: The aspect of the resource the keyword set describes.

language.title: Language
language.description: Code for the spoken/written language used (typically 'eng' for English)'.

lineage.title: Lineage
lineage.description: Information on the history of the resource, inc. data quality and methodological limitations.
examples: This dataset is fictitious and does not exist, it therefore has no lineage.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Information about how the resource or element related to the resource is maintained.

maintenance_frequency.title: Maintenance frequency
maintenance_frequency.description: How often the resource, or element related to the resource, is reviewed and updated.

metadata_standard.title: Metadata standard
metadata_standard.description: Information about the metadata standard used for the record describing the resource.

name.title: Name
examples: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

online_resource.title: Online resource
online_resource.description: An external website or page related to an element related to the resource, such as a website for a contact (e.g. a BAS staff profile).

href.title: URL
href.description: URL to the external website or page.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the external website or page.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the external website or page.
examples: The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry.

function.title: Function
function.description: The kind of action or service the external website or page provides.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: The status of the resource, or element related to the resource.

reference_system_info.title: Reference system information
reference_system_info.description: Information about the spatial Coordinate Reference System (SRS/CRS) used by the resource.

value.title: value
value.description: CRS code, typically as a URN.

version.title: Version
version.description: Where the CRS is part of a versioned registry, the version used.

authority.title: Authority
authority.description: Provider of, and body behind, the registry defining the CRS.

spatial_representation_type.title: Spatial representation type
spatial_representation_type.description: Describes the form of the resource's spatial information (i.e. raster/vector).

spatial_resolution.title: Spatial resolution
spatial_resolution.description: Describes the resolution of the resource's spatial information. May be set to null to indicate no resolution.

supplemental_information.title: Supplemental information
supplemental_information.description: Any additional information. Typically used for disclaimers.

temporal_extent.title: Temporal extent
temporal_extent.description: A description of the time a resource covers.

period.title: Period
period.description: A set of dates for a period of time that encloses the resource.

thesaurus.title: Thesaurus
thesaurus.description: Name, version and provider of a keyword set.

title.title: Title
title.description: The name of the resource, or element related to the resource.

topics.title: Topics
topics.description: ISO topic keywords that describe/classify the resource.

transfer_option.title: Transfer option
transfer_option.description: Data transfer option, describing where and how the resource can be accessed.

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of the transfer option if it uses files for example.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Abbreviation for the unit the size is measured in (e.g. 'MB' for megabytes).

magnitude.title: unit
magnitude.description: Size of the transfer option in a given unit.

vertical_extent.title: Vertical extent
vertical_extent.description: A description of the vertical volume a resource covers.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: XML ID attribute for the vertical CRS, typically based on the CRS code in the form 'ogp-crs-[code]'.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the vertical CRS (e.g. 'MSL height' for Mean Sea Level height).

remarks.title: remarks
remarks.description: Clarifying information about the vertical CRS.
examples: Not specific to any location or epoch.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Domain in which the vertical CRS is defined.

domain_of_validity.title: Domain of validity
domain_of_validity.description: The area the vertical CRS is valid for (e.g. the world).

href.title: URL
href.description: URL or URN for a resource that defines the domain of validity.

vertical_cs.title: Vertical Coordinate System
vertical_cs.description: The coordinate system used in the vertical CRS.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL or URN for a resource that defines the coordinate system.

vertical_datum.title: Vertical Datum
vertical_datum.description: The datum used in the vertical CRS.

href.title: URL
href.description: URL or URN for a resource that defines the datum.

$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: JSON Schema keyword indicating the schema a document complies with.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Information about the metadata record describing the resource.

identification.title: Identification
identification.description: Information about how to reference, categorise, or describe the resource.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Information about to acquire, enquire about or retrieve the resource
